dialogue.action msg: Nice job! You haven't lost your touch, it seems.
I'm surprised my vocal cords can keep up- I've kinda strained them in the past.

dialogue.action narrate: Yeah! I'd say that was really cute!

dialogue.action msg: Huh? You heard that too, right?
What does it look like I'm doing? I'm doing my own insurrection to usurp your position as mayor of Fever Town obviously.
Like I'd ever let you do that!
(Psst, Tea. What the fuck did he just say?)
